ModMetaData.name: Titular Royalty
ModMetaData.author: Canon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds titles to the player faction you can grant to your pawns with the Staff of Royalty 
(VERSION 1.1): Custom Titlelists
(VERSION 1.2): Custom Titles Support
(VERSION 1.2.1): Extra Debug Logging
(VERSION 1.2.2): Patched the Antinium Mod
(VERSION 1.3): Added Support for 1.4 and alternate Roman Titles
